channel.title: CVE Feed for Zephyr -- shell
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zephyr -- shell

item.title: CVE-2017-14202|2024-08-05T19:20:41.231Z -- zephyr -- shell
item.description: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer vulnerability in the shell component of Zephyr allows a serial or telnet connected user to cause a crash, possibly with arbitrary code execution. This issue affects: Zephyr shell versions prior to 1.14.0 on all.

item.title: CVE-2017-14201|2024-08-05T19:20:41.236Z -- zephyr -- shell
item.description: Use After Free vulnerability in the Zephyr shell allows a serial or telnet connected user to cause denial of service, and possibly remote code execution. This issue affects: Zephyr shell versions prior to 1.14.0 on all.
